title: Wild Turkey Hunt
description:
Hot off their success of the Deer Hunter series, Sunstorm Interactive tried their hand at allowing players to gun down another delicious animal.

Wild Turkey Hunt is a simulated hunting experience focusing on the favorite meal for those who celebrate Thanksgiving. Before you can gobble up your dinner, you must track and take down your prey in various wooded environments including the eastern woodlands, Great Plains, and southwest landscapes. After finding a target, you can use a turkey call to lure it closure to your crosshairs. You may also save your scores in the Hunter's Log and see where you rank among other sportsmen.
